name: Waze Smaller Sidepanel Tabs
description:
Waze addons are great! Only downside is; each seems to want their own tab! This can get messy.
This is a simple stylesheet to make the tabs smaller. Very usefull if you have a few tabs.
additional_info:
update 02-03-2015:
- Bugfix; Image in tab name broke the style; image hidden.
- Now only adjusts the nav tabs to go to a addon; not the tabs in a addon window
